contentParagraphs: The customer was a British company which creates 100% brand-customized online marketplaces.
responsibilities: Prototype, code, test and deploy in an agile development environment
Improve application based on user experience feedback
Collaborate within the sales team and with security consultants to establish and refine requirements
achievements: Built B2B service platform from scratch with Ruby on Rails 4.2
Reorganized checkout flow using PayPal ExpressCheckout, which resulted in increasing sales up to 17%
Improved existing, and developed new e-commerce products and applications, resulting in a diversified product line and increased customer revenue
